Description: Provision a managed Kubernetes cluster (AWS EKS, Google GKE, or local kind/minikube for development).
Acceptance Criteria:
- Kubernetes cluster is accessible via kubectl.
- Cluster nodes are healthy and ready.
- Documentation of cluster setup is added to repo.

Description: Deploy Prometheus for metrics collection and Grafana for visualization of cluster health and microservices.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Prometheus is deployed and can scrape metrics.
- Grafana is deployed and login works.
- Basic dashboard shows CPU/Memory usage.

Description: Create GitHub Actions workflow to automatically test, build, and deploy microservices to Kubernetes.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Workflow triggers on push/PR.
- Services are built and deployed.
- Logs visible in GitHub Actions.

Description: Deploy Kafka cluster to handle streaming of raw data from ultrasound devices.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Kafka brokers are running.
- Topics created.
- Test producer/consumer works.

Task: Build Python Microservice for Kafka Consumer & Validation
Description: Build a Python microservice that consumes raw data from Kafka, validates it, and flags invalid records.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Consumes Kafka messages.
- Validation rules applied.
- Invalid records logged.

Description: Create a real-time service that streams clean data and produces each row as a Kafka message.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Service containerized.
- Messages published to Kafka.
- Logging enabled.

Description: Create a Flink-based job to validate streaming data in real-time and reconcile it.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Flink job consumes Kafka.
- Invalid records flagged.
- Reconciliation logic applied.

Description: Process clean data to apply feature selection, extraction, and transformation.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Pipeline runs end-to-end.
- Feature set generated.
- Logs available.

Description: Fine-tune models using prepared feature sets.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Training completes.
- Metrics meet thresholds.
- Model saved.

Description: Integrate services with InfluxDB for real-time metrics.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Metrics written to InfluxDB.
- Real-time updates visible.

Description: Create dashboards for cluster, Kafka, Flink, and service metrics.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Dashboards accessible.
- CPU, memory, Kafka rate visible.
